info.task: navigate to beginning of modal dialog
info.title: Navigate to the beginning of a modal dialog in reading mode

setupScript.name: openAddDeliveryAddressDialogAndFocusFirstInput
setupScript.description: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' modal dialog, and sets focus on the first input

user: With the reading cursor on an input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the beginning of the dialog.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on an input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the beginning of the dialog.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Level of the heading (2) is conveyed
Text of the heading ('Add Delivery Address') is conveyed
